author: torsten
msg: remove hard coded AuthType and AuthName from Apache2__RequestUtil.h

author: torsten
msg: avoid a superfluous module list scan in modperl_module_insert()

author: arkurth
msg: Removed code from capture subroutine which copies the reference vmx file after copy_vmdk is called because copy_vmdk handles this task.

Moved $reservation_password declaration in prepare_vmx to a commented-out section later on.  This section is the only place it's used and the declaration was causing warnings to appear in the log file if the password wasn't initialized.

author: pburba
msg: Allow switch from r0 working copy to work again.

author: pburba
msg: Don't convert a valid svn_location_segment_t describing only revision 0 into
starting and ending revision of 0 is legitimate, but mergeinfo with a
svn_merge_range_t with the same is invalid.
